ygData.subject: Neato Stuff
ygData.msgSnippet: OK.. i finally got mt DF boots YAY! (better than the bronze i have been sporty). And here is my tale : After getting the key from Rathyl, go to Drelzna s room.
ygData.messageBody:
OK.. i finally got mt DF boots YAY! (better than the
bronze i have been sporty).

And here is my tale :

After getting the key from Rathyl, go to Drelzna's
room. She isnt there, just 3 necros, pets and the
Undead Knight. COOL!

So myself (40), another 40 SK and a 35 necro start to
clear the necros. The Undead Knight suddenly jumps in
and attacks our Necros pet. DOH!

Then he suddenly jumps on the other SK. DOH! And he
isnt the wussie little greenie anymore either. He
con'd white to our Necro and punches for 80s.

So i tell the necro to Gate to kill the Aggro while i
finish clearing the room. Meanwhile our other SK is
trying to zone...i dont know if he tried to Feign or
not, but if he did, it didnt work :(

Anyway, since i didnt have the key, i had to wait for
the TT down in the jail to spawn, so he could come up
and open the door for me so i can get to the Undead
Knight who was very considerately guarding our friends
corpse.

I turn in all the parts and get my boots..yipee

Our Necro then sits down to med a little. A skeleton
that was near by gets up and attacks him. The Undead
Knight then starts attacking me!?!?!?! First punch was
for 80..ouchy..almost died..zoned with 50HP..and that
was with all 3 of us beating on him. (Maybe he really
didnt care for the Heart Flutter i cast on him).

Anyway..doesnt his sound odd to anyone else? Why would
the Knight turn aggro on me if the Necro was the one
in combat with the skel.

After the Drelzna room incident, i thought maybve it
was similar to Llrodd, where he is indifferent unless
you attack something, then he gets midevil on you. But
if that was the case, then the Knight should have
attacked the Necro and not me. It looks like he turns
Aggro..on anything thats around.

Who cares you say? Well, this makes getting to him
really difficult. First off, even at level 40,
everything in Drelzna's room attacks still. Which
means, if he is in there, he will attack.
Which means we have to try to ignore something hitting
us for 80s, while we clear the room, then either gate
or feign. Which means only certain people can help
you, and they have to make sure that they dont attack
him, regardless of the DMG he is doing.

My question to you all, is this:
Does this sound like a bug? The part of him going
Aggro on anyone instead of just the one who was
fighting a Najena Inhabitant?







=====
